values:
I'd like to give my condolences to all of the family and friends of the 33 Virginia Tech students who died today. I'm so sorry for your loss. It is such a terrible thing to happen. When I first heard, I didn't believe it. I guess it's the most deadly shooting rampage in US history. Terrible, horrible. It's sad that it takes an incident like this to make us all appriciate what we've got.

I love you all and I'm so very glad that you're all safe.

"People don't keep journals for themselves. They keep them for other people, like a secret they don't want to tell but they want everyone to know. The only safe place for your thoughts is your memory, which people can't take and read when you're notlooking- at least not yet."

-Marilyn Manson, "The Long Hard Road Out Of Hell"
